barInfo.description: 开放自由的类贴吧式留言板

list.author: 孙天骁
list.content:
if (httpMethod === 'post' && options.autoTrim !== false) {
      const trimIgnore = options.trimIgnore || [];
      const trim = (obj = {}) => {
        for(const key of Object.keys(obj)) {
          if (isString(obj[key]) && !trimIgnore.includes(key)) {
            obj[key] = obj[key].trim();
          } else if (isObject(obj[key])) {
            trim(obj[key]);
          }
        }
      };
      trim(data);
    }

list.author: 孙天骁
list.content:
interface IInvokeOptions {
  autoTrim?: boolean;
  trimIgnore?: string[];
}
